stocks.name: Iphone 14
stocks.description: The iPhone 14 Pro display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 15.54 centimetres / 6.12 inches diagonally (actual viewable area is less).
